name: Super Hazelnut Quest
description:
A 1980's style retro arcade platformer

Game features
  • 15 different levels
  • 3 bosses
  • A good range of easy and difficult gameplay
  • An insane mode for those who have mastered the game
Controls

Keyboard

Z - Jump/Select
X - Attack
Arrow Keys - Move/Aim

Xbox Gamepad
A - Jump/Select
B - Attack
Left Joystick - Move/Aim

Press Esc to exit the game at any time

Changelog V1.0.1

  • You get an extra 2 lives after each boss
  • You refill an extra heart halfway through each level

Let me know what you think in the comments!
